Body: I have a Samsung GALAXY TAB on Android 4.1.2. Recently, while transferring pictures from internal storage to SD card, I lost some photos. Since then, I have been trying to get my photos back. I have downloaded some recovery software, but the problem is they don't recognize my device. I have tried USB debugging, but it requires mass storage. How can I enable the USB mass storage option, or is there an alternative way to get my photos back?
Title: Recovery software doesn't recognize Samsung Galaxy Tab even after turning USB debugging on

history.Text: I hacve samsung GALAXY TAB 4.1.2 . recently while transferring pics from int storage to sd card, i lost some photos. from then,  ihave been trying like hell to get my photos back.i have downloaded recovery softwares  but the problem is THEY DONT RECOGNISE MY DEVICE. i have TRIED USB DEBUGGING but they are demanding for mass storage. TELL ME HOW TO ENABLE THIS USB MASS STORAGE OPTION OR AN ALTERNATIVE TO GET MY PHOTOS BACK
